service.name: TFN Reporting
service.description: For businesses, this service enables submission of information required to comply with their specific obligations as employers if the business has employees, such as, lodgment of employee Tax File Number declarations.

Dimension.name: Lodge Pay As You Go Withholding (PAYG) Form
Dimension.desc: For businesses, this service enables submission of information required to comply with their specific obligations as employers if the business has employees, such as, lodgment of employee Tax File Number declarations and payment summaries. For individuals, this service enables reduction of their pay as you go (PAYG) tax withheld from payments made to them for the year via PAYG Withholding Variation form.

Dimension.name: Lodgment Service
Dimension.desc: The Lodgment cluster encompasses all services which require the community to lodge information (usually via a form) to the Tax Office to report what their current situation is (usually their income & expenses) to accurately identify what their tax and superannuation obligations are or if they are due for a refund or payment. Timeliness and accuracy of lodgments from the community is crucial in a self assessment system, which is why this cluster also includes lodgment support services to assist the community that need help to meet their lodgment obligation through deferrals and suspensions.
